data.text: @DaveAtherton20 @Yorkshirecath One of the MPs was staring full free crech facilities should be given to MPs and Parliament should sit only 2 hrs a day! On their over 80 plus k pay and expenses. A lib dim MP another public purse parasite. Some parents aren't even on 40k between them!
@DaveAtherton20 @Yorkshirecath And the 10k they got two years ago
@DaveAtherton20 Don’t forget the 5 billion funding cut to the NHS, which should have had 350 million a week according to a bus?

@DaveAtherton20 Pigs of Westminster

Where's Guy / Guido ...

Need a fucking rocket up their arse.. 

Or as the Libberynabypands would say 

"  waft a socially distanced sparkler in their general direction "

@DaveAtherton20 @PaulKer28916554 Who + how to effect real reforms necessary to implement the Bullough Wylie etc reforms?
FT gave publicity but sod all done due to our largely faceless, untaxed land cartels?
With an unremarkable 6bed detached in Wimbledon earning
more pa than an NHS brain surgeon + Chief Nurse ?
@DaveAtherton20 Gosh! And I was feeling slightly pleased to get £8.89 more a week in my State Pension
